noisepp::CurveModule

noisepp::CurveModule Class Reference

#include <NoiseCurve.h>

Inheritance diagram for noisepp::CurveModule:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Maps the values from the source modules onto the curve defined by the specified control points (at least 4)

Public Member Functions
